definitions: A point of transition between two different states.
A pointed end where two curves meet.
A moulded projection at the point of a small arch in Gothic tracery.
A cone-shaped prominence on the surface of a tooth.
A pocket or fold in the wall of the heart or a major blood vessel that fills and distends if the blood flows backwards, so forming part of a valve.
A point at which the direction of a curve is abruptly reversed.
Each of the pointed ends of the crescent moon.
A sharp rigid point of a leaf.
The initial point of an astrological sign or house.
